Title: Argentina
Plot: Fresh out of jail, Isaak renews his pursuit of Dexter while Quinn continues his power struggle with the Koshkas. Dexter tries to keep Debra in the dark about his relationship with Hannah, but a surprise visit from Astor, Cody and Harrison throws a wrench into his plans.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language and sexual themes
GuestStars: Preston Bailey, Santiago Cabrera, Andrew Kirsanov, Evan George Kruntchev
